overview: Nok, an upcountry boy, is a talented boxer who dreams of one day becoming an actor. He meets 3 other guys, Pao, Kung and David, each with their own aspirations.  Pao would like to become a country singer, Kung would like to play Thai traditional opera while David would like to be a magic artist. All four of them meet by coincidence and they will have to support each other in order to reach their goals.
title: Man of Ma Year
